nsgl.random.raw

Class SeedableGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsgl.random.raw.SeedableGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RawGenerator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ranecu, Ranlux, Ranmar, RanMT

    public abstract class SeedableGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements RawGenerator

    Title: SeedableGenerator

    Description: Abstract definition of a RawGenerator that uses a seed for generating uniform distributed pseudo random numbers in the interval [0.0,1.0) (x~U[0,1)). It is similar to the seedable class definition in the RangPack library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SeedableGenerator()
      Creates a seedable generator with a time dependent seed (using the current time)
      SeedableGenerator(java.util.Date seed)
      Creates a seedable generator with the given time dependent seed
      SeedableGenerator(long seed)
      Creates a seedable generator with the given seed

      Returns the seed used by the generator
      long initSeed()
      Returns a seed calculated from the current date.

      Returns a seed calculated from a given date.

      Returns a seed calculated from a given seed
